    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractDisk

        public AbstractDisk()
        Looks for a directory at xlattice/overlays/store relative to the default directory. If the directory is absent, it and any necessary intermediate directories should be created. Otherwise the subclass should size the store and set fileCount and bytesStored.

      • AbstractDisk

        public AbstractDisk(java.lang.String fromHereToXlattice)

      • fileCount

        public int fileCount()

      • clear

        protected void clear()
        Remove all files stored on the abstract disk. Subclasses must actually do this, possibly using bulk operating system methods, then call this method to reset the counts. XXX CONCURRENCY PROBLEMS
